scripts.start: node_modules/.bin/watchify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties syntax-decorators ] ] -o previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js -v -d src/app.js
scripts.build: node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties syntax-decorators ] ] src/app.js | uglifyjs -cm > previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js
scripts.build:debug: node_modules/.bin/browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] --plugins [ transform-class-properties syntax-decorators ] ] src/app.js -d -o previouslyOn_app/www/js/index.js
